description:
From our law office in Crested Butte, Colorado, the attorneys at Doehling Law Accident & Injury Law, P.C., provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout Gunnison County and beyond who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Over the course of our history, our law firm's attorneys have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, and we have grown to include five total offices across the Western Slope. This level of success is the direct result of our unwavering commitment to our clients coupled with our more than 60 years of combined legal experience. We promise to fight hard on your behalf to help you make your life whole again following a preventable tragedy.

What's more, our lawyers previously worked for insurance companies early in their legal career, so we have invaluable insight into the industry and the tactics insurance providers use to reduce or deny claims. Backed by this knowledge, we can devise the most effective strategy possible to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need and the justice you deserve.

To discuss your legal needs with a member of our team, you can contact Doehling Law Accident & Injury Law, P.C., to schedule a free evaluation of your claim. Our law office also offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you safe and healthy.
